data.eml:eml: First record of the genus Kimulodes Tjeder & Hansson in West Africa with description of a new species (Neuroptera, Ascalaphidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Michel, Bruno (2012): First record of the genus Kimulodes Tjeder & Hansson in West Africa with description of a new species (Neuroptera, Ascalaphidae). Zootaxa 3497: 37-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282457
